feed.title: This Strange World
feed.subtitle: The world is a strange place. From creepy conspiracy theories, to weird laws, to terrifying cults, this podcast explores them all. Each week, one of our hosts takes a deep dive into a strange, weird, and random topic, and discusses what they found with the other hosts.

author.name: Gavin Berger, Leah Ettinger, and Chris Ashe

entry.title: SCP Foundation Part 1 - Season 1 Episode 5
entry.content:
Leah discusses some of her favorite spooky SCPs while Gavin and Chris accept that they will never fall asleep peacefully again. (Hint: Don’t listen to this late at night.)

Sources

http://www.scp-wiki.net/
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SCP_Foundation
https://youtu.be/ZUFIxk5rtbQ
https://youtu.be/yeYc4rEjJW4

author.name: Gavin Berger, Leah Ettinger, and Chris Ashe

entry.summary: Leah discusses some of her favorite spooky SCPs while Gavin and Chris accept that they will never fall asleep peacefully again. (Hint: Don’t listen to this late at night.)

entry.title: Bizarre Tourist Attractions - Season 1 Episode 4
entry.content:
Gavin talks about some of the most bizarre tourist attractions in the world while Chris and Leah guess where they are. Play along at home! (Hint: None of them are in South America, but that doesn’t stop Leah from always guessing there.)

Sources

http://tripstodiscover.com/22-of-the-worlds-most-bizarre-tourist-attractions/
https://www.cntraveler.com/galleries/2014-04-25/wacky-tourist-attractions/

author.name: Gavin Berger, Leah Ettinger, and Chris Ashe

entry.title: The Jonestown Cult - Season 1 Episode 3
entry.content:
This episode contains strong themes and may be not suitable for younger listeners.

Chris shares his research on the Jonestown cult with Gavin and Leah for our first episode about cults. (Hint: Don’t drink the Kool-Aid.)

Sources

https://youtu.be/xNY2yGA1fNQ
https://youtu.be/VWqACvTknls
https://abcn.ws/2QhwAfh
https://abcn.ws/2zDh87U
https://abcn.ws/2zDEvOu
https://abcn.ws/2xXe4S4

entry.title: Titanic Conspiracy Theories - Season 1 Episode 2
entry.content:
For our first conspiracy theory episode, Leah talks about some Titanic conspiracy theories, while Chris and Gavin provide some pretty solid banter and ask clarifying questions.

Sources

https://www.history.com/news/titanic-sinking-conspiracy-myths-jp-morgan-olympic
https://youtu.be/4pywFRpEcZA
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RMS_Titanic_conspiracy_theories

author.name: Gavin Berger, Leah Ettinger, and Chris Ashe

entry.summary: For our first conspiracy theory episode, Leah talks about some Titanic conspiracy theories, while Chris and Gavin provide some pretty solid banter and ask clarifying questions.

entry.title: Animal Laws - Season 1 Episode 1
entry.content:
For our first episode, Gavin brings some weird animal laws from around the world to discuss with Leah and Chris. (No animals were harmed in the making of this episode, although some may be insulted.)

Sources

https://www.pawculture.com/for-fun/weird-pet-news/the-weirdest-animal-laws-in-america/
https://dogtime.com/reference/dog-laws/19486-12-strange-animal-laws
https://www.entirelypets.com/odd-animal-laws.html
https://bitrebels.com/lifestyle/40-strangest-pet-laws-around-world/

author.name: Gavin Berger, Leah Ettinger, and Chris Ashe
